stories.text:
Does anyone know easy/free way to log HN not being down, but returning an availability error — from a system that’s not dependent on AWS; HN is currently on AWS as a result of the main & fallback servers experiencing disk failures.

Preferably it would be report that publicly available like this one, but this one doesn’t appear to log these types of errors:

https://hn.hund.io/
stories.title: Ask HN: “We're having some trouble serving your request. Sorry”

stories.text:
One time i was on filezilla FTP and moved a folder to the parent folder. I slipped with the mouse. The application recreated logs and all the parent folders. Filezilla got crazy. A simply undo or re-move was tricky. I only slipped with the mouse. 30 min downtime.

Has something similiar ever happened to you?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the worst that ever happened when you slipped with a mouse?
